alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 9:53AM EST until January 09 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Leon County in Big Bend Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend Florida... Eastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... West central Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 1130 AM EST. * At 953 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of West Bainbridge to 12 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Monticello, Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Midway, Cairo, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Tallahassee Community College, Thomasville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, St George Island, Boston, Ochlocknee, and Pavo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for Big Bend Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla
